<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #190: The Choosing](/Sources.aspx?ID=198) pg. 81

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Theater_ represents prophecy and how prophets can't change the unfolding pageantry of fate. As long as you have _The Theater_ invested and as long as you are not already [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), when you would gain the doomed condition, attempt a DC 10 flat check. On a success, you do not gain the doomed condition.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision ([fortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=76)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** You are targeted by a [misfortune](/Traits.aspx?ID=110) effect;  **Effect** _The Theater_ attempts to counter the misfortune effect before it affects you. It has a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) level equal to your level divided by 2 (rounded up), and a counteract modifier of your Class DC – 10.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
